text: The men's 10,000 metres event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at the National Stadium in Independence Park, on 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Gebre-Egziabher Gebremariam ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sileshi Sihine ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Solomon Bushendich ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 10,000 metres
